casebody.data:
Edwin Ray PARKER and Kenneth Brad Ott
v.
The SENATE OF THE STATE of Louisiana, The Board of Supervisors of Louisiana State University and Agricultural and Mechanical College, and the State of Louisiana NO. 2018-C-0546 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 15, 2018 Denied. WEIMER, J., would grant.

HUGHES, J., would grant.

GENOVESE, J., would grant.
